content.html: Did some reading into MQTT after setting up some #Tasmota plugs that used it and realised I wanted to know more about the structure of topics, messages etc. Blogged my notes #blogumentation style (@JamieTanna would be proud) ;) brunty.me/post/understan…
content.value:
Did some reading into MQTT after setting up some #Tasmota plugs that used it and realised I wanted to know more about the structure of topics, messages etc.

Blogged my notes #blogumentation style (@JamieTanna would be proud) ;)
